languageOptions: 'sql' - (default) Standard SQL;'bigquery' - GCP BigQuery;'db2' - IBM DB2;'db2i' - IBM DB2i (experimental);'hive' - Apache Hive;'mariadb' - MariaDB;'mysql' - MySQL;'n1ql' - Couchbase N1QL;'plsql' - Oracle PL/SQL;'postgresql' - PostgreSQL;'redshift' - Amazon Redshift;'singlestoredb' - SingleStoreDB;'snowflake' - Snowflake;'spark' - Spark;'sqlite' - SQLite;'transactsql' or 'tsql' - SQL Server Transact-SQL;'trino' - Trino (should also work for Presto, which is very similar dialect, though technically different);
